曼聯名宿加利尼維利表示，他看好小將菲爾鐘斯他日會成為紅魔新精神領袖。
菲爾鐘斯兩周前以1600萬鎊身價從布力般流浪加盟曼聯，引起了很大關注。這名19歲的小將有「新泰利」之稱，作風頑強，頗具領導能力。
作為前輩，加利尼維利對菲爾鐘斯評價頗高，他表示：「我覺得菲爾鐘斯會成為一名巨星，我真的這樣認為。他有潛力成為曼聯未來隊長，他看起來相當硬朗，是球會未來十年的頂樑柱。」
「過去兩年菲爾鐘斯表現出色，也展現出很好的潛質，特別是對陣曼聯的時候，他真的是宗好收購。」
談到曼聯今夏在轉會，加利尼維利認為球會至少會再買一人。
「我認為領隊費格遜會簽一位中場中路球員，因為史高斯退休了，而夏格維斯則會離隊。」

如果佢哋真係玩高位逼搶，猁狗應該會直接放長波等nigga同盲鬥跑偷一兩粒再守到完場

If the Europa League title holders qualify for the group stage via their domestic league, the third-placed team of association 5 (France) will enter the group stage, and runners-up of the highest-ranked associations in the second qualifying round will also be promoted accordingly.

If the Champions League and/or Europa League title holders qualify for the qualifying rounds via their domestic league, their spot in the qualifying rounds is vacated, and teams of the highest-ranked associations in earlier rounds will be promoted accordingly.

An association may have a maximum of five teams in the Champions League.[60] Therefore, if both the Champions League and Europa League title holders come from the same top-four association and finish outside of the top four of their domestic league, the fourth-placed team of the league will not compete in the Champions League and will instead compete in the Europa League.
